catalogue_description: Fihrist: Union Catalogue of Manuscripts from the Islamicate World
title: سبحة الأبرار
author: Jāmī, 1414-1492 جامی
decoration: Carpet pages, decorative borders, ten miniatures.
record_origin: Manuscript description based on: Beeston, A. F. L. (Alfred Felix Landon); Ethé, Hermann, 1844-1917.; Sachau, Eduard, 1845-1930; Catalogue of the Persian, Turkish, Hindûstânî, and Pushtû manuscripts in the Bodleian Library, Oxford; at the Clarendon Press 1889-1953.
